inclusion.criterion: Histologically confirmed supratentorial anaplastic astrocytoma or glioblastoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum creatinine < 1.5 times the lab's upper normal limit
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: AST or ALT < 3 times the lab's upper normal limit
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Alkaline phosphatase < 3 times the lab's upper normal limit
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Serious medical or neurological condition with a poor prognosis
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Second cancer requiring radiotherapy or chemotherapy (contact the study coordinat if necessary)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Conditions associated with regular vomiting that might affect oral administration of the drugs
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient was taking part in other intervention studies within a month of starting this study
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is currently undergoing treatment with temozolomide, CPT-11, and Avastin. He has experienced progressive lower extremity weakness and urinary retention.
